clinical.chief_complaint: Evaluate and treat; Denies snoring but witnessed apneas reported by spouse; Prior PSG showed severe OSA (AHI: 24, 4% desaturation scoring). CPAP user with pressure too high and mask leaking; Needs pressure adjustment; DME noted: E0601, A7034; Apria and Lincare involved. Patient uses wheelchair; seizure disorder history; pacemaker; oxygen dependent. COVID positive last month; MRSA carrier. Interpreter needed (Spanish speaking); wheelchair accessible. Coverage ended 01/01/2020. Family history: father snores (ignore).
